item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, March 30, 2025 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Everyone knows all the apps on your phone (365 points | 135 comments)
2. Show HN: Cloud-Ready Postgres MCP Server (45 points | 4 comments)
3. Utah becomes first US state to ban fluoride in its water (198 points | 405 comments)
4. Convert Linux to Windows (146 points | 164 comments)
5. Towards fearless SIMD, 7 years later (88 points | 20 comments)
6. Why Apple's Severance gets edited over remote desktop software (415 points | 251 comments)
7. Atop 2.11 heap problems (125 points | 51 comments)
8. Commercials that David Lynch directed (2018) (115 points | 25 comments)
9. Accessible open textbooks in math-heavy disciplines (176 points | 55 comments)
10. Self-contained Python scripts with uv (66 points | 11 comments)
11. Paged Out #6 [pdf] (212 points | 17 comments)
12. Bringing Record and Replay debugging everywhere on Linux (8 points | discuss)
13. C. Elegans: The Worm That No Computer Scientist Can Crack (21 points | 3 comments)
14. The disappearance of Gaia, ESA spacecraft will be turned off on 27 March 2025 (75 points | 24 comments)
15. XAN: A Modern CSV-Centric Data Manipulation Toolkit for the Terminal (65 points | 10 comments)
16. Matrix Calculus (For Machine Learning and Beyond) (101 points | 17 comments)
17. The Mysterious Flow of Fluid in the Brain (22 points | 4 comments)
18. Lvgl: Embedded graphics library to create beautiful UIs (104 points | 21 comments)
19. Koto Programming Language (159 points | 125 comments)
20. Introduction to Open Source Laptop Project (14 points | 2 comments)
21. A timeline of IBM keyboard history (26 points | 3 comments)
22. Veloren – voxel action-adventure role-playing (279 points | 68 comments)
23. Spark AI (YC W24) is hiring a full-stack engineer in San Francisco ( | hide)
24. Real Time Chess – A physical chess board without the concept of turns (225 points | 36 comments)
25. 6502 as a Service (21 points | 4 comments)
26. Vramfs: Vram Based Filesystem for Linux (95 points | 32 comments)
27. OSS-SEC: Three bypasses of Ubuntu's unprivileged user namespace restrictions (52 points | 10 comments)
28. Electric power generation from Earth's rotation through its own magnetic field (15 points | 9 comments)
29. Msgpack23 – A modern, header-only C++ library for MessagePack (de)serialization (22 points | 9 comments)
30. My TV started playing a video in full screen by itself. What happened? (275 points | 156 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, March 30, 2025 at 6:20 AM UTC
